gus_calendar¶

__init__¶

models¶

class gus2.gus_calendar.models.Calendar(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

class Calendar is a widget and inherits from the Widget class. This class is also related to Calendar_item as many Calendar_items are related to a single Calendar.

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception Calendar.MultipleObjectsReturned¶

class gus2.gus_calendar.models.Event(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

class Calendar_item inherits from models.Model and is related to the Calendar class as Calendar_items are related to a single Calendar (using a ForeignKey)

exception DoesNotExist¶

tests¶

This file demonstrates two different styles of tests (one doctest and one unittest). These will both pass when you run “manage.py test”.

Replace these with more appropriate tests for your application.
